name: part_006
file: tmp_【チラ見せ枠】わためぇ Night Fever!! in Zepp Tokyo [P_ptI5iH7Vg]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Introduction and welcome message for the 1st live concert.
Pre-concert montage featuring the venue, dressing room, and Watame walking to the stage.
Performance of the song 'Ohayou no Uta'.

subtitles.original: 本日は角巻わため 1st Live わためぇ Night Fever!! in Zepp Tokyo
subtitles.english: Thank you very much for joining us today for Tsunomaki Watame's 1st Live: Watame Night Fever!! in Zepp Tokyo,

subtitles.original: supported by Bushiroad にご来場いただきまして、誠にありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: supported by Bushiroad.

subtitles.original: 大変長らくお待たせしました。本公演は間もなく開演いたします。
subtitles.english: Thank you very much for waiting. The performance will begin shortly.

subtitles.original: 会場の皆さんも、配信でご覧の皆さんも、一緒に盛り上がる準備はできていますか？
subtitles.english: To everyone here at the venue and everyone watching the livestream, are you ready to get excited together?

subtitles.original: いいですね！最後まで一緒に楽しみましょう！
subtitles.english: That's the spirit! Let's have fun together until the very end!

subtitles.original: わためぇ Night Fever!! スタート！
subtitles.english: Watame Night Fever!! Start!

subtitles.original: おはようのうた
subtitles.english: The Morning Song

subtitles.original: おはようのうた 今日が始まる
subtitles.english: The morning song, today begins.

subtitles.original: みんな、いくよ！
subtitles.english: Everyone, here we go!

subtitles.original: どんな一日を描こうかな
subtitles.english: I wonder what kind of day I should draw.

subtitles.original: ワクワクお絵かき 夢物語綴ろう
subtitles.english: Excitingly drawing, let's write a dream story.

subtitles.original: そんな子供じゃいられないよ
subtitles.english: I can't stay a child like that.

subtitles.original: 分かったフリした大人の自分が言う
subtitles.english: Says the adult version of me who pretends to understand.

subtitles.original: 笑いながら 苦いこと話したリ
subtitles.english: Talking about bitter things while laughing.

subtitles.original: 泣きながら ゲームをしてたり
subtitles.english: Playing games while crying.

subtitles.original: 思いもかけないことのその全部が 君のせい 本当にありがとう
subtitles.english: All those unexpected things are because of you, thank you so much.

subtitles.original: 「おはよう」って「おはよう」って 今日もまた言えるね
subtitles.english: Saying "Good morning," "Good morning," we can say it again today.

subtitles.original: 君と重ねた色がふえ
subtitles.english: The colors I've layered with you increase.

subtitles.original: 難しいことは分からない 無邪気な笑顔に助かる
subtitles.english: I don't understand difficult things, I'm saved by an innocent smile.

subtitles.original: 何度でも君を呼び送るよ
subtitles.english: I'll call out to you again and again.

subtitles.original: せーので駆け出したあの日から 随分遠くへ
subtitles.english: Since that day we dashed off on "Ready, go!", we've come quite far.

subtitles.original: やっとここまで来たけれど
subtitles.english: Finally, we've come this far, but...

subtitles.original: ねぇ、今 君が見てる私は どんな顔して
subtitles.english: Hey, what kind of face do I have now as you're looking at me?

subtitles.original: ちゃんと笑えているのかな
subtitles.english: I wonder if I'm smiling properly.

subtitles.original: 誰も知らない頑張りがあったね
subtitles.english: There was hard work that no one knew about.

subtitles.original: 君も私もそうだから 何度も言う「ありがとう」
subtitles.english: Because it's like that for both you and me, I'll say "Thank you" many times.

subtitles.original: 「おかえり」って「ただいま」って 今日もまだ言えるよ
subtitles.english: Saying "Welcome home," "I'm back," we can still say it today.

subtitles.original: 君と重ねた色がふえ
subtitles.english: The colors I've layered with you increase.

subtitles.original: 白くて柔らかい夜に 泣きだす声は震えても
subtitles.english: In the white and soft night, even if the voice that starts to cry trembles,

subtitles.original: 何度でも朝を迎えた
subtitles.english: Morning has come again and again.
